titles.title: CRITICAL Act
Comprehensive Reimbursement Initiative Targeting Investment and Care in rural Locations
CRITICAL Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the treatment of critical access hospital services furnished by a critical access hospital located in a noncontiguous State.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Comprehensive Reimbursement Initiative Targeting Investment and Care in rural Locations or the CRITICAL Act
This bill increases the Medicare payment rate by 4% for services provided by critical access hospitals in Alaska and Hawaii.
